thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 10 de 698
thread.title: Zachary Clews

author: Zachary Clews
title: Zachary Clews
text:
Not been my first car I've rented with them but it will be the last one.
Got the car in malaga airport, told the staff that drop off will be 3 hours later....staff said no problem( as they were putting there jackets on ready to leave)
So here I come 3 hours later on the day and get a 43 euro invoice because returned it late.
Lesson to be learnt, make sure to not let staff get away and do what you asked them to do.
